name: Elves vs Goblins Defender
description: Lead elfish warriors into battle against hordes of goblins, golems and ghosts.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard
